titles.title: A bill to improve the operation of agricultural price support programs, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture.

bill.summary: 6/24/1987--Introduced. Amends the Commodity Credit Corporation Charter Act and other Federal law to: (1) increase from $25,000,000,000 to $40,000,000,000 both the amount of permissible outstanding obligations and the borrowing authority of the Commodity Credit Corporation (CCC); and (2) fund reimbursement of the CCC's net realized losses by means of a current, indefinite appropriation.
